name: Go Cloud Run API Starter
description: A template for a Go 'Hello World' API, ready for Cloud Run. Features configurable GCP Project ID, service name, and log level.

params.name: Google Cloud Project ID
params.description: Your Google Cloud Project ID (e.g., my-gcp-project). This is required for GCP logging and deployment.

params.name: API Service Name
params.description: The name for your API service (e.g., my-hello-api). Used in logs and responses.

params.name: Log Level
params.description: Minimum logging level for the application.

params.name: Application Port
params.description: Port the application will listen on internally (Cloud Run handles external mapping).
